  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the score and the credentials using wallet, scorer slug, talent id or account identifier"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/credentials"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the score and the credentials using wallet, scorer slug, talent id or account identifier

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"account_source","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["farcaster","github","wallet"]},"description":"The source of the account"},{"name":"slug","in":"query","description":"The slug of the data issuer to filter the credentials","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"scorer_slug","in":"query","description":"The slug of the scorer to filter the credentials. Default is the builder score scorer","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-API-KEY","in":"header","description":"Your Talent Protocol API key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Get credentials using Talent ID","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"credentials":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"category":{"type":"string","enum":["Activity","Credibility","Developer","Humanity","Identity","Metrics","Achievements","Affiliations","Accounts"],"description":"The category of the credential"},"data_issuer_name":{"type":"string","description":"The data issuer of the data point"},"data_issuer_slug":{"type":"string","description":"The slug of the data issuer"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the data point"},"slug":{"type":"string","description":"The slug of the credential"},"readable_value":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The value of the credential in a human readable format"},"updated_at":{"type":["string","null"],"format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp of when the credential was updated"},"points":{"type":"integer","description":"The points of the credential"},"external_url":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The external url of the credential"},"uom":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The unit of measure of the credential"},"max_score":{"type":"integer","description":"The max score of the credential"},"calculating_score":{"type":"boolean","description":"The flag that indicates if the credential is calculating score"}}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"unauthorized request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
